name: Sommelier's Secrets
description:
The origins of wine remain shrouded in mystery. Civilizations have flourished and generations have evolved since, but we have barely managed to decode the intricacies of one of the oldest alcoholic beverages known to mankind.
This wine tasting trail will take you on an immersive journey of tasting and appreciating 6 fabulous wines, sprinkled with the most interesting stories to help you understand the culture and nuances of the spirit.
This Wine Tasting will comprise a guided tasting of 6 wines from around the world with varying styles and structures, emphasising on sustainable wine making practices.
